enhanced.description: The Los Alamos National Labs BSD-3 Variant is a permissive software license based on the BSD-3-Clause license. It allows for free use, modification, and distribution of software with additional obligations for government use.
enhanced.review: The variant maintains most of the typical BSD-3-Clause permissive nature but adds specific conditions relating to government use and publication of documents based on the software.
